verses.roman:
vraja-vadhū-gaṇera ei bhāva niravadhi
tāra madhye śrī-rādhāya bhāvera avadhi

synonyms: vraja-vadhū-gaṇera—of the young wives of Vraja; ei—this; bhāva—mood; niravadhi—unbounded; tāra madhye—among them; śrī-rādhāya—in Śrīmatī Rādhārāṇī; bhāvera—of the mood; avadhi—the highest limit.
translation: This mood is unbounded in the damsels of Vraja, but among them it finds its perfection in Śrī Rādhā.
